name: betterweb
description: A chrome plugin that uses Machine Learning and Natural Language Process to help building a better, more rational web.

scripts.build-all: cp -rf src/ dist_unpacked/ && npx webpack && sass dist_unpacked/scss:dist_unpacked/css && echo 'Copying + Webpack + SCSS done. Reload plugin from browser.'
scripts.build-all-windows: robocopy src/ dist_unpacked/ * /E & npx webpack & sass dist_unpacked/scss:dist_unpacked/css & echo 'Copying + Webpack + SCSS done. Reload plugin from browser.'

author: BetterWeb Team
